last_episode_to_air.name: Thunderball
last_episode_to_air.overview: The first televised Pro Thunderball game! Three balls in play at all times, gorgeous honeys and vicious hounds to distract the players, and a car that roams the infield...

name: Upright Citizens Brigade
overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade is an improvisational comedy and sketch comedy group that emerged from Chicago's ImprovOlympic in 1990. The most recent incarnation consists of Matt Besser, Amy Poehler, Ian Roberts, and Matt Walsh. The original incarnation of the group consisted of Besser, Ali Farahnakian, Drew Franklin, Adam McKay, Roberts, Rick Roman, and Horatio Sanz. Other early members included Neil Flynn, Armando Diaz, and Rich Fulcher.

episodes.name: The Bucket Of Truth
episodes.overview: A Realtor shows a house featuring the "Bucket of Truth" and a "Hot Chicks Room". Also featuring the Unabomber and his Girl Scout friend Cassie.

episodes.name: Poo Stick
episodes.overview: Big Red Cat gets harassed by a poo stick while performing mini-movies.

episodes.name: Saigon Suicide Show
episodes.overview: In an attempt to destabilize society by eradicating prejudice, the UCB host a benefit featuring the Saigon Suicide Squad.

episodes.name: Power Marketing
episodes.overview: "Power Marketing" guru Duke reveals the secret of his success: a new brain. Also, a new recruit is hired in the hyperminimalist office building, and the secret of the ass pennies is revealed.

episodes.name: Children's Revolution
episodes.overview: A pro-union puppet show at the elementary school incites one boy to stand up to his bullying school-bus driver.

episodes.name: The Story of the Toad
episodes.overview: People use the heartwarming story of the toad to bring meaning to their lives.

episodes.name: Lady of The Lake
episodes.overview: A frat guy dates the Lady of the Lake, who bores him with the story of how she once presented King Arthur with Excalibur.

episodes.name: Time Machine
episodes.overview: Andy goes back in time to play cards with Jesus and President Truman.

episodes.name: Cyborgs
episodes.overview: The UCB's cyborg project goes wrong.

episodes.name: The Little Donny Foundation
episodes.overview: Little Donny has a giant penis....but doesn't know it.

episodes.name: Master Dialectitian
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade brings baby fights to the suburbs, and a boxer is forced to go ten rounds with a horse. Also, a member of the UCB dies 6 times.

episodes.name: Bomb Squad
episodes.overview: A sex-obsessed psychic tracks a buxom jewel thief, and two procrastinating bomb squad officers seize an illegal dildo bong.

episodes.name: Mogomra vs. the Fart Monster
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade fights the onslaught of throwing star culture and watches Mogomra the Giant Country Lobster battle the Evil Fart monster.

episodes.name: Real World
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade gathers human oddities, including a businessman with a baby head hand and a senior citizen desperately trying to mate with a dolphin.

episodes.name: Face Therapy
episodes.overview: A salon owner keeps rich women beautiful by slapping them across the face, and a man burns calories by pretending to flee from armed soldiers.

episodes.name: Infested With Friars
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade infests a theme restaurant with a swarm of mutated comedians from the Friars Club, and a teenager discovers he can beat his curfew by faking his own kidnapping.

episodes.name: Spaghetti Jesus
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade discovers a modern day holy relic: The Spaghetti Jesus.

episodes.name: Big City
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade puts a hooker in charge of a gourmet coffee shop.

episodes.name: Hurricane
episodes.overview: A TV Weatherman desperately tries to save Miami from a devastating hurricane.

episodes.name: Supercool
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade creates a documentary that finally reveals What is Supercool?

episodes.name: Costumes
episodes.overview: When a man tries "werewolf sex" to turn his girlfriend on, she stabs him with a wooden stake.

episodes.name: Mafia
episodes.overview: The Upright Citizens Brigade explores the seamy underworld of organized crime.

episodes.name: Hospital
episodes.overview: Grim Reapers work in shifts at the hospital, until they claim Workman's Comp for scythe-related injuries.

episodes.name: Band
episodes.overview: The Breaker-Uppers go on tour; The Murderers perform at an old-fashioned caka-walka.

episodes.name: Food
episodes.overview: The Glendale Fitness Authority sets up Fat Camps to imprison the overweight.

episodes.name: College
episodes.overview: When one player is possessed by a demon at the college basketball game, the only thing that can save the day is Santa Liqueur.

episodes.name: Sex
episodes.overview: When Adair is reincarnated as a sandwich, the UCB must fulfill a sexy prophecy to bring him back.

episodes.name: Small Town
episodes.overview: A quiet small town deals with earthquake parties, dolphin aliens, and Armageddon.

episodes.name: Technology
episodes.overview: Mike the Astronaut is trapped in Virtual Reality with a malfunctioning telephone, forced to eat nothing but edible panties, and both verbally and physically abused by the French.

episodes.name: Thunderball
episodes.overview: The first televised Pro Thunderball game! Three balls in play at all times, gorgeous honeys and vicious hounds to distract the players, and a car that roams the infield...
